coreAttributes.name: dory
coreAttributes.description: A long, wooden-shafted spear, almost [style.sizes(300)] from tip to butt. The arcane blade on the end has a leaf-like shape, while an arcane, spiked counterpart on the opposite end, known as a 'sauroter', acts as a counter-weight.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Thrust your dory at [npc2.name] and skewer [npc2.herHim]!
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of [npc.her] dory as [npc.she] [npc.verb(ready)] [npc.herself] to use it in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Thrusting out with [npc.her] dory, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to stab [npc2.name] in the chest; the ethereal arcane blade passing through [npc2.her] torso to drain [npc2.her] energy!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] dory, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to slash through [npc2.her] [npc2.arm] with the ethereal blade and drain [npc2.her] energy!

With a quick [npc.step] forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] dory, sinking the ethereal blade into [npc2.her] shoulder and causing [npc2.herHim] to lose some energy!
hitDescriptions.criticalHitText: Expertly sidestepping around [npc2.namePos] attempt to block [npc.her] attack, [npc.name] [npc.verb(deal)] a devastating strike with [npc.her] dory!

missDescriptions.missText: Thrusting out with [npc.her] dory, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to stab [npc2.name] in the chest, but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] dory, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick [npc.step] forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] dory, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
